Title: Relates to requiring the office for people with developmental disabilities to submit an updated waitlist and placement report to the senate and assembly
Summary: Requires the office for people with developmental disabilities to submit an updated waitlist and placement report to the senate and assembly.
LawCode: Add ยง13.28, Ment Hyg L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the mental hygiene law, in relation to requiring the office for people with developmental disabilities to submit an updated waitlist and placement report to the senate and assembly
